content: then k2 from cn to complete c4f slip next 2 stitches onto cn and hold at front cast off in patt and weave in ends of work k2 then k2 from cn place beginning rib on top of finishing rib with left m marker hand side of beginning rib lined up with the bobble pm place marker edge mark positions for buttons according to sm slip marker buttonholes sew on buttons rm remove marker this pattern belongs to celtic handknits and was written by roisin graham celtic handknits publications are intended for personal use only use of this pattern for commercial gain is prohibited without the consent of celtic handknits hat instructions using 5mm us 8 needles co 24 sts measurements rim - cable pattern to fit head circumference 54cm/21 25in row 1 rs k6 p2 c4b c4f p2 k6 materials row 2 p6 k2 p8 k2 p6 row 3 k6 p2 k8 p2 k6 ❖ 5 0mm us 8 needles row 4 as row 2 ❖ appx 140m 153yds stylecraft special aran row 5 c6b p2 c4b c4f p2 c6b with wool shade 2424 ocean row 6 as row 2 ❖ cable needle row 7 as row 3 row 8 as row 2 gauge these 8 row set the patt continue in patt untkil 24 row and 18 sts over 10cm/4in in stocking st work measures 47 5cm/18 5in ending on row 7 bobble 24 sts sew short edges of rim together crown with rs facing pick up and knit 90sts around the edge of the rim join in the round pm to mark beginning of the round work in stocking st for 5 5cm/2 2in next round k18 pm 4 times k18 next round decrease round sm k1 k2tog k to 3 sts before m ssk k1 sm k1 k2tog 4 times k to 3 sts before m ssk k1 80 sts knit 2 rnds repeat decrease round every second round 6 times 20 sts next k4 rm 5 times next k1 s2kpsso k1 5 times 10sts to complete cut yarn thread onto a needle and pull through remaining sts pull tightly and weave in on ws of work weave in ends this pattern belongs to celtic handknits and was written by roisin graham celtic handknits publications are intended for personal use only use of this pattern for commercial gain is prohibited without the consent of celtic handknits
